description: NSG rules allowing potential malicious inbound traffic
query: AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL | where Direction_s == 'Inbound' and Action_s == 'Allow' and ThreatIntelIndicator_s has 'Malicious' | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), SourceIP_s
title: NSG Allowed Inbound Malicious Flows
